医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新试验启动，以确定对患有细支气管炎的婴儿最有效的呼吸支持一项新的全国试验旨在确定对因细支气管炎住院的婴儿最有效的呼吸支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/New-trial-launches-to-define-the-most-efficient-breathing-support-for-babies-with-bronchiolitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/New-trial-launches-to-define-the-most-efficient-breathing-support-for-babies-with-bronchiolitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=570078af-51ab-497b-b48e-af862bf79c65 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:59:08 -0400 New trial launches to determine the most effective breathing support for babies with bronchiolitis
新研究所将基于食物的营养干预措施纳入医疗保健​一家新成立的首创机构旨在通过致力于将基于食物的营养干预措施纳入医疗保健中来治疗疾病并促进健康公平，从而解决医疗系统中的明显差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/New-institute-to-integrate-food-based-nutrition-interventions-into-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/New-institute-to-integrate-food-based-nutrition-interventions-into-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9027bd58-fc27-4422-b126-c0ceea7bdab3 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:56:04 -0400 New institute to integrate food-based nutrition interventions into health care
远程医疗可以改善阿片类药物使用障碍治疗的获取和保留一项分析肯塔基州和俄亥俄州 2019-2020 年医疗补助数据的新研究显示，与在非远程医疗环境中开始治疗相比，通过远程医疗开始丁丙诺啡治疗阿片类药物使用障碍与延长治疗时间的可能性增加相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Telehealth-initied-buprenorphine-treatment-linked-to-higher-treatment-retention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Telehealth-initied-buprenorphine-treatment-linked-to-higher-treatment-retention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6053b597-6fe2-40b7-aef7-499f459b782c Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:46:00 -0400 Telehealth may improve access and retention for opioid use disorder treatment
泛冠状病毒疫苗在小鼠研究中取得成功一种旨在预防三种不同致命冠状病毒的疫苗在小鼠研究中取得了成功，证明了杜克人类疫苗研究所研究人员开发的泛冠状病毒疫苗的可行性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Pan-coronavirus-vaccine-shows-success-in-mouse-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Pan-coronavirus-vaccine-shows-success-in-mouse-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=287d2ede-a92b-49ad-ad5d-cf7e973e1d04 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:42:40 -0400 Pan-coronavirus vaccine shows success in mouse studies
研究揭示病毒抑制细菌 CRISPR-Cas 免疫系统的新方法微观发现不仅能让科学家了解我们周围的微生物世界，还能提供控制 CRISPR-Cas 生物技术的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Research-reveals-new-way-viruses-suppress-the-CRISPR-Cas-immune-systems-of-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Research-reveals-new-way-viruses-suppress-the-CRISPR-Cas-immune-systems-of-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc8e0fad-2f1d-4984-af1d-1f3fc8fe626a Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:38:38 -0400 Research reveals new way viruses suppress the CRISPR-Cas immune systems of bacteria
陈·扎克伯格倡议推出新的生物医学研究中心，以开发改善健康的技术今天，陈·扎克伯格倡议 (CZI) 宣布在纽约市启动一个新的生物医学研究中心，该中心将促进该地区领先的科学技术机构之间的合作，目标是解决 10 到 15 年的重大科学挑战。年的时间范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Chan-Zuckerberg-Initiative-launches-new-biomedical-research-hub-to-build-technologies-for-improving-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Chan-Zuckerberg-Initiative-launches-new-biomedical-research-hub-to-build-technologies-for-improving-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3bbd9a07-604d-45cc-95e6-ec27885921b4 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:34:54 -0400 Chan Zuckerberg Initiative launches new biomedical research hub to build technologies for improving health
科学家为患有复发性前列腺癌的男性确定了两种有前景的新治疗方案雪松-西奈癌症研究人员为患有复发性前列腺癌的男性确定了两种有前景的新治疗方案：与目前的标准治疗相比，这两种方法都可以帮助患者在疾病不进展的情况下活得更长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Scientists-identify-two-promising-new-treatment-options-for-men-with-recurrent-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Scientists-identify-two-promising-new-treatment-options-for-men-with-recurrent-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6d5cc63-0373-4fe9-92ca-0a7a9aa26ef7 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:30:15 -0400 Scientists identify two promising new treatment options for men with recurrent prostate cancer
试验表明，矫正弯曲鼻中隔的手术比鼻喷雾剂更有效英国发表的一项试验表明，矫直弯曲鼻中隔（分隔两个鼻孔之间的空间的骨和软骨薄壁）的手术比鼻喷雾剂更有效，并且应该为至少有中度症状（例如呼吸中断）的成年人提供。今天由英国医学杂志报道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Surgery-to-straighten-a-crooked-septum-more- effective-than-nasal-sprays-trial-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Surgery-to-straighten-a-crooked-septum-more- effective-than-nasal-sprays-trial-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e04aa00-f067-4385-81e9-a4c172f47212 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:25:37 -0400 Surgery to straighten a crooked septum more effective than nasal sprays, trial suggests
研究揭示了卵巢中 NAD+ 水平如何随着年龄的增长而下降，从而影响生育能力女性的生育能力通常会在 30 多岁时下降，生殖功能最终会在更年期停止。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Study-sheds-light-on-how-NAD2b-levels-decline-with-age-in-the-ovaries-affecting-fertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Study-sheds-light-on-how-NAD2b-levels-decline-with-age-in-the-ovaries-affecting-fertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64ec0086-6c0f-4d9c-97ae-f6d7db83a16a Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:21:54 -0400 Study sheds light on how NAD+ levels decline with age in the ovaries, affecting fertility
主要研究获得 560 万欧元资助，以更好地了解儿童囊性纤维化由 RCSI 医学与健康科学大学和爱尔兰儿童健康中心 (CHI) 领导的一项重大新研究已获得 560 万欧元的资助，用于在未来五年内与爱尔兰和英国的婴儿和儿童合作，以更好地了解囊性纤维化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Major-study-wins-e282ac56M-funding-to-build-a-better-understanding-of-cystic-城纤维化-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Major-study-wins-e282ac56M-funding-to-build-a-better-understanding-of-cystic-城纤维化-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b877763-58db-4f4d-91fb-b1d4879bea58 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:13:56 -0400 Major study wins €5.6M funding to build a better understanding of cystic fibrosis in children
